text.section: Unless licensed to operate a tip jar by the agency, a person may not offer to another a chance from a tip jar or otherwise operate a tip jar.

A holder of a tip jar license may not:
allow a minor to play a tip jar; or
operate a tip jar on property owned by the Board of Education of Washington County.
Unless licensed as a wholesaler to sell tip jar packets by the agency, a person may not sell or wholesale a tip jar packet for profit.
